Game.Name: Shougi Meikan '93 (Japan)
Game.plot: Shogi Meikan '93 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Hect,which was released in Japan in 1992.Cheat: Screen Adjusting ModeWhen you begin a new game and proceed to the mode selection screen, and then proceed on from there, you'll be asked to continue or to select another stage. There, you can use Controller 2's D-Pad to move the screen position around.
